Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays, due to mechanical problem on a train at Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays, due to mechanical problem on a train at Pulaski. 

Some Blue Line trains will operate from O'Hare to UIC-Halsted, only, as most trains will be rerouted O'Hare-bound at UIC-Halsted station.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

#7 Harrison

#126 Jackson

#53 Pulaski

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available from Forest Park to UIC-Halsted to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
